Package com.travelbank.knit.schedulers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Consumer<T>
    This class is used in Models an anonymous inner classes and will handle the response delivery to Presenters.
    MainHandlerSupplierInterface
    Interface that is used by MainHandlerSupplier and it's testing counterpart.
    SchedulerInterface
    Base interface for all schedulers Knit provides.
    SchedulerProvider
    Base interface for Schedulers and it's testing counterpart.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndroidMainThreadScheduler
    This scheduler runs all tasks on the Android main thread through a Handler provided by the MainHandlerSupplier
    ImmediateScheduler
    This scheduler runs the tasks directly on the thread that it was fired from.
    IOScheduler
    This scheduler is meant to handle all simple IO operations such as Rest calls and Database look ups.
    KnitIOReceiverThread
    This class contains a HandlerThread that receives results from all tasks that get ran inside KnitIOThreadPool.
    KnitIOThreadPool
    Holds a ExecutorService with 4 Threads.
    KnitTaskFlow
    This class is only used by InternalModels generated by KnitProcessor.
    KnitTaskFlow.ScheduleFlower<T>
    Inner class that handles all stubbing.
    MainHandlerSupplier
    Class that holds an instance to Android Main Thread Handler.
    Schedulers  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    KnitSchedulers
    Scheduler types that Knit supports.
